review_blob: Sweet and bit roasty flavour. Aroma is quite complex reminds me of salt. Ive drank it from bottle so I cant really say about appearance. I wouldnt recommend it to young drinkers because its hard to drink.

When opened beer had a nice arome that reminded me of homemade bread.When poured in it had a nice golden color. Liquid itself was quite cloudy because the beer is not filtered, wich is not a bad thing.It had a very nice white head.Taste:medium sweetness, lightly bitter, lightly sour, 
I would recomend it to anyone.
